text: The shooting competition at the 2014 Central American and Caribbean Games was held in Veracruz, Mexico. The tournament was scheduled to be held from 15–24 November at the El Lencero Police Academy. ==Medal summary== ===Men's events=== {| |- ||10m Air PistolMen’s 10m air pistol results | | | |- ||10m Air
